content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Billie Eilish

|
}}
American singer-songwriter Billie Eilish has won over 150 awards for her work in the music and film industries. She has been nominated for thirty-two Grammy Awards,  thirty-one MTV Video Music Awards, seventeen Billboard Music Awards, nine Brit Awards, four Teen Choice Awards, ten Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards, two Golden Globe Awards, and eleven People's Choice Awards, as well as two Academy Awards (Oscars).
In 2019, Eilish received two Guinness World Records, "Most simultaneous US Hot 100 entries by a female" and "Youngest female at No.1 on UK albums chart".
__TOC__
